HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: DPD: 0 - 199 Kč, Česká pošta - Balík do ruky: 0 - 299 Kč
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: obvykle do druhého dne po potvrzení objednávky

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: obvykle do druhého dne po potvrzení objednávky

providers: Česká pošta - Balík na poštu nebo do Balíkovny

SUMMARY: DELIVERY OPTIONS: The e-shop offers home delivery for standard and bulky goods, pickup at Česká pošta branches (Balík na poštu/Balíkovna), and personal pickup at three store locations in Trutnov. PROVIDERS: Delivery is handled by DPD, Česká pošta, and TOPTRANS for bulky items. The specific carrier is automatically selected by the system based on order parameters. PRICING: Standard home delivery costs 0-299 Kč. Bulky item delivery is 0-990 Kč. Parcel shop delivery is 0-99 Kč. Pricing for in-store pickup is not stated. Free shipping is available for over 10,000 products, but a specific order value threshold is not mentioned. COD surcharge is between 39-49 Kč. NOTABLE FEATURES: Delivery is generally next business day. Weekend delivery is limited to Saturdays at select post offices and one of the Trutnov pickup locations. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is detailed on a dedicated page, covering providers, pricing ranges, and delivery times. However, it lacks information on a clear free shipping threshold based on order value and does not mention pricing for in-store pickup. The automatic selection of the carrier means the customer cannot choose their preferred service.
